title: 下部 黑暗森林 第2节
paragraphs: “不会吧，哪儿有你们那时蓝啊。”
肯定比那时蓝，蓝多了。罗辑没有把这话说出来，他只是沉浸在这无边湛蓝的拥抱中，任心灵在其中融化，然后有一闪念的疑问：我真到天堂了吗？在他的记忆中，这样纯净的蓝天，只在生活过五年的那个与世隔绝的伊甸园中见过，只是这个蓝天上没有那么多白云，只在西天有极淡的两抹，像是谁不经意涂上去的，东方刚刚升起的太阳在完全透明的清澈大气中有一种明亮的晶莹，边缘像是沾着露水。

罗辑把目光向下移，立刻感到了一阵眩晕，他身处高处，而从这里看到的，他好半天才意识到，是城市。开始他以为自己看到的是一片巨型森林，一根根细长的树干直插天穹，每根树干上都伸出与其垂直的长短不一的树枝，而城市的建筑就像叶子似的挂在这些树枝上。建筑的分布似乎很随意，不同大树上的叶子有疏有密。罗辑很快看到，他所在的冬眠苏醒中心其实就是一棵大树的一部分，他就住在一片叶子里，现在，他们正站在悬挂这片叶子的一根树枝上，这就是他看到的那道伸延到前方的狭长平台。回头，他看到了自己所在的这棵大树的树干，向上升到他看不到的高度。他们所在的树枝可能位于树的中上部，向上向下，都能看到其他的树枝和挂在上面的建筑叶子（后来他知道，城市的地址真的就是XX树XX枝XX叶。）。近看，这些树枝在空中形成错综的桥梁网络，只是所有桥梁的一端都悬空。
“这是什么地方？”罗辑问。
“北京啊。”
罗辑看看护士，她在朝阳中更加美丽动人。再看看被她称做北京的地方，他问：“市中心在哪儿？”
“那个方向，我们在西四环外，差不多能看到整个城市呢。”
罗辑向护士所指的远方眺望了好一会儿，大声喊道：“不可能！怎么可能什么都没留下来？！”
“你要留下什么？你们那时这里还什么都没有呢！”
“怎么没有！？故宫呢？景山呢？天安门和国贸大厦呢？才一百多年，不至于全拆了吧？！”
“你说的那些都还在啊。”
“在哪儿？”
“在地面上啊。”
看着罗辑惊恐万状的样子，护士突然大笑起来，笑得站不住了扶着旁边的栏杆：“啊，呵呵呵……我忘了，真对不起，我忘了好多次了，你看啊，我们是在地下？一千多米深的地下……要是我哪天时间旅行到你们那会儿，你可以报复我一次，别提醒城市是在地面上，我也会给惊成你这样儿的，呵呵呵……”
“可……这……”罗辑向上伸出双手。
“天是假的，太阳也是假的。”女孩儿努力收住笑说，“当然，说是假的也不对，是从上面的一万米高空拍的图像，在下面放映出来的，也算是真的吧。”
“城市为什么要建在地下，一千多米，这么深？”
“当然是为了战争，你想想，末日之战时地面还不是一片火海？当然，这也是过去的想法，大低谷时代结束后，全世界的城市就都向地下发展了。”
“现在全世界的城市都在地下？”
“大部分是吧。”
罗辑再次打量这个世界，他现在明白了，所有大树的树干都是支撑地下世界穹顶的支柱，同时也被用做悬挂城市建筑的基柱。
“你不会得幽闭症的，看看天空多广阔！到地面上看天可没这么好。”

罗辑再次仰望蓝天——或说蓝天的投影，这一次，他发现了天上的一些小东西，开始只看到了零星的几个，后来视力适应了，发现它们数量很多，布满了天空。很奇怪，这些天上的物体竟让他联想到一个毫不相关的地方，那就是一家珠宝店的展柜。那是在成为面壁者之前，他爱上了想象中的庄颜，有一次，竟痴迷到要为想象中的天使买一件礼物。他来到了那家珠宝店，在展柜中看到了许多白金项链挂件，那些挂件细小精致，摊放在一张黑色绒面上，在聚光灯下银光闪闪。
如果把那黑色绒面变成蓝色，就很像现在看到的天空了。
“那是太空舰队吗？”罗辑激动地问。
“不是，舰队从这儿看不到的，它们都在小行星带以外呢。这些嘛，什么都有，能看清形状的那些是太空城市，只能看到一个亮点儿的是民用飞船。不过有时候也有军舰回到轨道上，它们的引擎很亮的，你都不能盯着看……好了，我要走了，你尽快回去吧，这里风很大的。”
罗辑转身刚要道别，却吃惊得说不出话来，他看到女孩儿把那伞——或她说的自行车——像背包似的背到后背上，然后伞从她后面立了起来，在她头上展开来，形成了两个同轴的螺旋桨，它们无声地转动起来——是相互反向转动，以抵消转动力矩。女孩儿慢慢升起，向旁边跳出栏杆，跃入那让罗辑目眩的深渊中。
她悬浮在空中对罗辑大声说：
“你看到了，现在是个挺不错的时代，就把你的过去当做一场梦吧，明天见！”
她轻盈地飞去，小螺旋桨搅动着阳光，远远地飞过两棵巨树之间，变成了一个小小的蜻蜓，有一群群这样的蜻蜓在城市的巨树间飞翔，但最引人注目的还是飞行的车流，像海底植物间川流不息的鱼群。朝阳照进了城市，被巨树分隔成一缕缕光柱，给空中的车流镀上了一层金辉。
面对这美丽的新世界，罗辑泪流满面，新生的感觉渗透了他的每一个细胞，过去真的是一场梦了。
当罗辑见到接待室中的那个欧洲面孔的人时，总觉得他身上有些与众不同的地方，后来发现是他穿的西装不闪烁也不映出图像，像过去时代的衣服一样，这也许是一种庄重的表示。法医秦明系列
同罗辑握手致意后，来人自我介绍说：“我是舰队联席会议特派员本·乔纳森，您的苏醒就是我奉联席会议的指示安排的，现在，我们将一起参加面壁计划的最后一次听证会。哦，我的话您能听懂吗？英语的变化很大。”
在听到乔纳森说话时，这几天罗辑由现代汉语的变化所产生的对西方文化入侵的担忧消失了，乔纳森的英语中也夹杂着汉语词汇，如“面壁计划”就是用汉语说的，这样下去，昔日最通用的英语和使用人数最多的汉语将相互融合，不分彼此，成为一种强大的世界语言。罗辑后来知道，世界上的其他语种也在发生着融合现象。
罗辑能够听懂乔纳森的话，他想：过去不是梦，过去还是找上门来了。但听到“最后一次”这几个字，他感觉这一切还是有希望能尽快了结。
乔纳森回头看看，好像是在核实门关严了没有，然后他走到墙边，激活了一个操作界面，在上面简单地点了几下后，包括天花板在内的五面墙壁全部消失在了它们显示的全息图像中。
这时，罗辑发现自己置身于一个会议大厅中，虽然一切都变化很大，墙壁和大圆桌都发出柔光，但这里的设计者显然想努力复制旧时代的风格，从大圆桌、主席台和总体布局体现的怀旧情结中，罗辑立刻就知道这是哪里。现在会场还空荡荡的，只有两个工作人员在会议桌上分发文件，罗辑很惊奇地发现现在还在用纸质文件，就像乔纳森的衣服一样，这应该也是一种庄重的表示。
乔纳森说：“现在远程会议已经是惯例，我们以这种方式参加，不影响会议的重要性和严肃性。现在离会议开始还有一段时间，您好像对外界还不太了解，是否需要我简单介绍一下现在世界的基本状况？”
罗辑点点头，“当然，谢谢。”
乔纳森指着会场说：“只能最简略地说一下，先说说国家的情况。欧洲成为一个国家，叫欧洲联合体，简称欧联，包括东欧和西欧，但不包括俄罗斯的欧洲部分；俄罗斯与白俄罗斯合并，国名仍叫俄罗斯联邦；加拿大的法语区和英语区分裂为两个国家；其他地区也有一些变化，但主要的就是这些了。”
罗辑很吃惊：“就这么点儿变化？都快两个世纪了，我以为世界已经面目全非了。”
乔纳森背对着会场，对罗辑重重地点点头：“面目全非了，罗辑博士，世界确实已经面目全非了。”
“不是啊，这些变化在我们的时代就已经现出端倪了。”
“但有一点你们预料不到：现在已经没有大国，在国际政治中。所有的国家都衰落了。”
“所有的国家？那谁崛起了？”
“一种国家之外的实体：太空舰队。”
罗辑想了好长时间，才理解了乔纳森这话的含义：“你是说，太空舰队独立了？”
“是的，舰队不属于任何国家，它们成为了独立的政治和经济实体，也像国家一样成为了联合国的成员。目前，太阳系有三大舰队：亚洲舰队，欧洲舰队和北美舰队，它们的名称只是说明各舰队的主要起源地，但舰队本身与它们的起源地已经没有任何隶属关系，它们是完全独立的。三大舰队中的每一支，都拥有你们时代超级大国的政治和经济实力。”
“我的天啊……”罗辑感叹道。
“但不要误会，地球并非处于军政府的统治下，舰队的领土和主权范围都在太空中，很少干涉地球社会内部事务，这是由联合国宪章规定的。所以，现在人类世界分为两个国际：传统的地球国际和新出现的舰队国际。三大舰队组成太阳系舰队，原来的行星防御理事会演变成太阳系舰队联席会议，是太阳系舰队名义上的最高指挥机构，但与联合国的情况一样，它只有协调功能，没有实际权力。
其实太阳系舰队本身也是名义上的，人类太空武装力量的实际权力由三大舰队的统帅部掌握。好，参加今天的会议，您知道这些已经差不多了，这次听证会就是由太阳系舰队联席会议召开的，他们是面壁计划的继承者。”
这时，全息图像中出现一个显示窗口，希恩斯和山杉惠子的图像出现于其中，他们看上去毫无变化。希恩斯微笑着向罗辑问好，山杉惠子则面无表情地坐在旁边，对罗辑的致意只是微微颔首做答。
希恩斯说：“我也是刚刚苏醒，罗辑博士，很遗憾地得知，在五十光年远的那个位置，您诅咒的那颗行星还围绕着那颗恒星在运行。”
“呵呵，确实是笑话，古代的笑话。”罗辑摆摆手自嘲地说。金庸小说全集
“但比起泰勒和雷迪亚兹来，您还是幸运的。”
“看来您是唯一成功的面壁者了，也许您的战略计划真的提升了人类的智力。”
希恩斯也露出了罗辑刚才的那种自嘲的笑容，他摇摇头说：“没有，真的没有。我现在得知，在我们进入冬眠后，人类思维的研究很快就遇到了不可克服的障碍，因为再深入下去，就要涉及大脑思维机制的量子层次，这时，同其他学科一样，他们碰到了不可逾越的智子壁垒。我们没有提升人类的智力，如果说真做了什么，那就是增强了一部分人的信心。”
罗辑进入冬眠时，思想钢印还没有出现，所以他不是太明白希恩斯最后一句话的含义，但他注意到希恩斯这么说时，一直冷若冰霜的山杉惠子的脸上掠过一丝神秘的笑容。
显示窗口消失了，这时罗辑看到会场已经坐满了人，与会者大部分都穿着军装，军装的模式变化并不大，所有与会者的衣服上都没有图像装饰，但他们的领章和肩章都发着光。舰队联席会议的主席仍为轮值，而且是一个文职官员。看着他，罗辑想起了伽尔宁，意识到他已经是两个世纪前的古人了，与那无数湮没于时间长河中的同时代人相比，无论如何自己都是幸运的。
在宣布会议开始后，主席发言：“各位代表，在这次会议上，我们将对本年度第47次联席会议提出的649号提案进行最后表决，该提案是由北美舰队和欧洲舰队联合提交的。我首先宣读提案内容。”
“在三体危机出现后的第二年，联合国行星防御理事会制定了面壁计划，并取得了各常任理事国的一致通过，于次年开始执行。面壁计划的核心内容，是由经过各常任理事国选定和推举的四位面壁者进行完全封闭的个人思考，制定并执行对抗三体世界入侵的战略计划，以避开智子对人类世界无所不在的监视，从而实现战略的隐蔽性。联合国推出了相应的面壁法案以保证面壁者制定和执行计划的特权。”
“面壁计划至今已经进行了二百零五年，其间，有过长达一个多世纪的停顿期。在这期间，计划的领导权由原行星防御理事会移交到现太阳系舰队联席会议。”
“面壁计划的产生有特定的历史背景。当时，三体危机刚刚出现，面对这个人类历史上史无前例的毁灭性危机，国际社会陷入了空前的恐惧和绝望中，面壁计划正是在这样的状态下诞生的，它不是理智的选择，而是绝望的挣扎。”
“历史事实证明，面壁计划是一个完全失败的战略计划。毫不夸张地说，它是人类社会作为一个整体，有史以来所做出的最幼稚、最愚蠢的举动。面壁者被赋予空前的、不受任何法律监督的权力，甚至被赋予欺骗国际社会的自由，这违背了人类社会最基本的道德和法律准则。”
“在面壁计划的执行过程中，大量的战略资源被没有意义地消耗，面壁者弗雷德里克·泰勒的量子舰队计划已被证明没有任何战略意义，而面壁者雷迪亚兹的水星坠落连锁反应计划，即使以目前人类的能力也根本无法实现。同时，这两个计划都是犯罪，泰勒企图攻击并消灭地球舰队，雷迪亚兹的企图则更加邪恶，竟然把整个地球生命世界作为人质。”
“另外两位面壁者也同样令人失望。面壁者希恩斯的思维提升计划目前还没有暴露出其真实的战略意图，但其初步阶段的成果——思想钢印，在太空军中的使用也是犯罪，它严重地侵犯了思想自由，而后者是人类文明存在和进步的基础。”
至于面壁者罗辑，他先是不负责任地用公共资源为自己营造享乐生活，其后又以可笑的神秘主义举动哗众举宠。”
“我们认为，随着人类力量的决定性增强和对战争主动权的把握，面壁计划已经没有意义，现在是结束这一历史遗留问题的合适时间。我们建议舰队联席会议立刻中止面壁计划，同时废除联合国面壁法案。”
“特此提交本提案。”
主席把提案文本缓缓放下，扫视了一下会场说：“现在开始对太阳系舰队联席会议649号提案进行表决。”
所有的代表都举起了手。

这个时代的表决方式仍是这么原始，有工作人员在会场中穿行，郑重地核实着表决票数。当他们把汇总结果提交主席时，主席宣布：“649号提案获得全票通过，并从此时开始生效。”主席抬起头来，罗辑不知道他是不是在看自己或希恩斯，同一百八十五年前那次远程参加听证会一样，罗辑仍然不知道自己和希恩斯的影像在会场的什么位置显示，“现在，面壁计划已经中止，同时废除联合国面壁法案。我代表太阳系舰队联席会议通知面壁者比尔·希恩斯和面壁者罗辑，你们的面壁者身份已经中止，由联合国面壁法案赋予你们的一切与面壁计划有关的特权，以及相应的法律豁免权都不再有效，你们将恢复自己所在国家的普通公民身份。”
主席宣布会议结束，乔纳森站起身来关掉了全息图像，也关掉了罗辑长达两个世纪的噩梦。
“罗辑博士，据我所知，这正是您想要的结果。”乔纳森微笑着对罗辑说。
“是的，正是我想要的，谢谢您，特派员先生，也谢谢舰队联席会议恢复了我的普通人身份。”罗辑以发自内心的真诚说。
“会议很简短，就是提案表决，我已被授权同您谈更具体的事项，您可以先谈自己最关心的事。”
“我的妻子和孩子呢？”罗辑迫不及待地问出了苏醒后一直折磨他的问题，事实上他在会议开始前刚见到乔纳森时就想问的。
“请您放心，她们都很好，都在冬眠中，我会给您她们的资料，您可以随时申请苏醒她们。”
“谢谢，谢谢。”罗辑的眼眶又湿润了，他再次有了那种来到天堂的感觉。
“不过，罗辑博士，我有一个个人建议，”乔纳森在沙发上向罗辑靠近了些说。“作为冬眠者，适应这个时代的生活并不容易，我建议您自己的生活稳定下来之后再苏醒她们，联合国支付的费用还可以再维持她们二百三十年的冬眠时间。”
“那，我个人到外面怎么生活呢？”
对罗辑的这个问题特派员一笑置之：“这个您不用担心，可能对时代不适应，但生活没有问题，在这个时代，社会福利很完善，一个人即使什么都不做，也能过相当舒适的生活。您过去工作过的大学现在还在，就在这个城市，他们答应考虑您的工作问题，过后他们会与您联系的。”
罗辑突然想到了一件事，这几乎让他打了个寒战，“我出去后的安全问题呢？ETO一直想杀我！”
“ETO？”乔纳森大笑起来，“地球三体组织早在一个世纪前就已被完全剿灭，现代世界已经没有他们存在的社会基础，当然有这种思想倾向的人还是存在的，但已经不可能形成组织了，您在外部世界是绝对安全的。”
临别时，乔纳森放下了官员的姿态，他的西装也闪耀起来，映出了夸张变形的星空，他笑着对罗辑说：“博士，在我见过的所有历史人物中，您是最幽默的。咒语，对星星的咒语，哈哈哈哈……”
罗辑独自一人站在接待室中，寂静中细细咀嚼着眼前的现实，在做了两个世纪的救世主之后，他终于变回到普通人了，新生活在他的前面展开。平凡的世界小说
“你变成普通人了，老弟！”罗辑的思想被一个粗哑的声音大声说出，他回头一看，史强走了进来，“呵呵，我听刚离开的那小子说的。”
重逢的欢喜中，他们交换了自己的经历。罗辑得知史强是两个月前苏醒的，他的白血病已经治好了，医生还发现他的肝脏病变的几率很高，可能是喝酒的原因，也顺便处理好了。其实，在他们的感觉中，两人分别的时间并不是太长，就是四五年的样子，冬眠中是没有时间感的，但在两个世纪后的新时代相遇，还是多了一层亲切感。
“我来接你出院，这儿没什么好待的。”史强说着从随身带的背包里拿出一身衣服，让他穿上。
“这……也太大了吧？”罗辑抖开那件夹克款式的上衣说。

translated_paragraphs: “No, there aren't any blues back then.”

He didn't say it out loud, but he was immersed in this boundless blue embrace and let his mind melt into it. Then a flash of thought: Have I actually entered paradise? In his memory, the pure sky like this only existed for five years at that idyllic garden, which was isolated from the world, only two clouds were so faintly visible in the West Sky, like someone had accented them there unconsciously. The rising sun in the completely transparent clear atmosphere had a crystaline brilliance on its edge, as if drizzled with dew.

罗辑 looked down and immediately felt a dizziness. He was in a high place, but he only realized later that what he saw was a giant forest. Start to see there firstly, he thought he saw a huge forest of trees reaching the skies, with each tree branching vertically with not-equal lengths, and the buildings in the city hung on these branches like leaves. The distribution of the structures seemed to be arbitrary; different leaves had denser or sparser gaps. Roege soon saw that he was living in a leaf among a huge tree. They were standing on a long branch suspended from this leaf. This is what he saw toward the front, an extended platform. Looking back, they saw their own tree, which rose up to the height beyond his sight limit. These branches in the sky may be located in the middle or upper part of the tree and both can see other branches hanging in the cities (later he found out that the address of the city was "XX tree XX branch XX leaf")
"What is this place?" Luo Ze asked.
Beijing.
The nurse looks more beautiful and charming in the sunshine. Look again at the place called Beijing, he asked, "Where is its center?"
We're at the top of the West 4 Ring Road, so we can see almost the whole city.
He looked out at the distant horizon for a while, and exclaimed loudly: “Impossible! How could everything be gone?!”
“What do you want to leave?” “We didn't have anything here then!”
"No way! The Forbidden City, Jingshan Park and Tiananmen Square? That's just a few hundred years old. They shouldn't be destroyed like that!"
You are still saying those.
Where are you?
On the ground.

看着 Luo Zhe shocked expression, the nurse suddenly laughed out loudly and leaned against the railings: "Ah, hahaha… I forgot, really sorry. I forgot many times, you see, we are underground? More than one thousand meters deep underground … If I time travel to your place someday, you can avenge me once, don't remind that the city is on the surface of the ground, I will also be scared like this when I arrive there too, hahaha…"
"I can't believe this. . . it has to be a dream."
The girl tried to hold back her laughter and said, "That's not really true. It's an image taken from above at a height of one million meters and then projected below."
Why would a city be built underground, more than 1000 meters deep?

Of course, it was for war. You know, the Armageddon when the earth turns into a sea of fire? Surely this is just an idea from the past and the big crisis after that caused all cities to move underground.
“Are all cities around the world underground?”
Mostly.
Rou Qu once again surveyed the world, and now he understood that all the main trunks of trees were the pillars supporting the dome of the underground world.
You don't have claustrophobia, just look how vast the sky is! You can't see as good from the ground.

$Rousseau looked up again at the sky—or rather, the projection of the sky. This time, he saw some small things in it that he initially saw only sparingly but later became accustomed to see more and more of them, covering the whole sky. It was very strange that these objects of the sky reminded him of a completely unrelated place, which is the display case of a jewelry store where he had dreamt about a fairy before becoming a wallflower. Once, he almost became obsessed with buying a gift for his imaginary angel in that jewelry store. He went there and saw many white gold necklaces hanging on the black velvet display trays underneath the spotlights. Those necklaces were small and exquisite, shining brightly.
If the black velvet is turned into blue, it will look just like the sky we can see now.
"Is that the Space Fleet?" rogue asked excitedly.

“No, they can't be seen from here. They are beyond the asteroid belt.” “There is everything there, but only those in the shape of cities can be clearly visible; while civilian crafts only emit a light, and sometimes also come back to orbit; their engines are very bright and you shouldn't look for too long… Well, I'm leaving now. You should hurry back.”

As Luo Zhe turned to leave, he was surprised into speechlessness when he saw the girl put her umbrella—or her bike, as she claimed—on her back in such a fashion that the umbrella would stand upright from behind her and then start spinning in parallel and at opposite directions with very little noise to cancel out the torque. The girl slowly rose into the air, jumping over the rail and flying towards Luo Zhe's jaw dropping depth below.
She floats in the air and speaks loudly to LuoJi.
You saw, it's a pretty good era, just treat your past like a dream and meet me tomorrow!

She flew away lightly, stirring the sunshine as she passed between two gigantic trees. She became a small dragonfly and flew over the city's towering trees. The car traffic was most noticeable though, like underwater plants, moving with a sea of fish swimming beneath it. The morning sunlight shone into the city and was divided into thin rays as it passed between the tall trees, adding an ethereal glow to the airborne cars.
Facing this beautiful new world, Luo Ze teared his face, the feeling of being anew penetrated every cell in his body. The past really was just a dream.

When Luo Ze met the European-looking person in the reception room, he felt that there was something different about him. Later on, he found out that it was because he wore a suit that did not reflect any images or flicker like the suits of past eras, which may have been an indication of gravitas. Forensic Medicine Doctor Qin Ming series

After shaking hands with Ben Jones, the special envoy of the Fleet Conference, who introduced himself as "I am Ben Jones, the designated representative of the Fleet Conference arranged by a mission. Now, let's join the last hearing on the wall-slab project together." He added that he might not speak English clearly due to the changes in pronunciation.

After hearing Jonathan speak, these days, Rourou's worries about the invasion of Western culture disappeared. Jonathan's English also contained Chinese words like "wall-plan," and gradually, the most commonly used language in the world and the one with the most people using it began to merge, becoming a powerful global language. Later, Ronuo found out that other languages were also undergoing a fusion phenomenon as well.

Roland could understand Jonathan's words. He thought to himself that this was not a dream, and it had come to him sooner than he imagined. But hearing "last time," however, gave him the feeling that things would soon be settled.

Jonathan turned around to make sure the door was locked and then he walked to the wall, activating a control panel that caused all the walls in the room - including the ceiling - to disappear in front of him in their full-scale holographic images.

$At this point, Luo Ze finds himself in a meeting hall, although everything has changed greatly, the walls and the large round table emit soft light, but the designer of this place is clearly trying to imitate old-fashioned style from the big round table, chairman's desk and overall layout. So Luo Ze immediately knew where he was. The conference hall is now empty except for two staff members distributing documents on the meeting table, which makes Luo Ze very surprised that even in this advanced era, paperwork is still being used like Jonathan's clothes, which is also a solemn expression of some kind.

Jonathan said, "Remote meetings have become the norm and we attend in this way without affecting the importance and seriousness of the meeting. There is still some time before the meeting starts so you don't seem to understand what is happening outside; do you need me to briefly explain the basic situation in the world now?"
Sure, thank you.

“Jonathan pointed to the stadium and said, ‘I only have a few minutes, so let me just summarize. Europe is now united as a country called EUA or the European Union that includes both East and West Europe but not Russian Europe; Russia has been combined with Belarus into the nation of Russia; the French-speaking region in Canada and the English-speaking region have become two separate countries, and there are also some other changes, but mainly those.’”
Roland was surprised. "Just a few changes? It's almost two centuries since the last time I visited the world, and I thought everything had changed completely."
Jonathan turned his back to the conference hall and pointed to Luo Ge with a thumbs-up sign. "The world has changed beyond recognition, Luo Ge, things have certainly changed."
But these changes have been looming in our time for a long time.
However, there is one thing you didn't expect: There are no great powers in international politics now. All countries have declined.
"Who's been rising?"
A space fleet from a country other than the United States.
After thinking for a long time, Luo Ze finally understood the meaning of Jonathan's words: "You mean that the space fleet is independent?"

Yes, the fleet does not belong to any country and has become an independent political and economic entity, much like a country. Currently, there are three fleets in the solar system: Asian Fleet, European Fleet and North American Fleet, which are merely nominal names for each fleet as they have no more ties with their origin countries, but rather each fleet is fully independent. Each of the three major fleets has the political and economic strength of a superpower from your era.
My God…

However, do not misunderstand. The Earth is not under military rule, and the territory and sovereignty of the fleet are in space, rarely interfering with the internal affairs of the Earth society. This is stipulated by the charter of the United Nations. Therefore, the human world has been divided into two internationals: traditional terrestrial international and new emerging interplanetary international. The three major fleets make up the Sun System Fleet, which originated from the former planet defense council and evolved into the Sun System Fleet Joint Committee, a joint body that is formally responsible for coordinating affairs but has no actual power like the United Nations.

“The actual power of the human space armed forces is controlled by the command centers of the three major fleets. Alright, to attend today's hearing, you already know these have been established, and the Hearing is being held by the Sun System Fleet League meeting, which is the successor to the Plan B facade.”

At this time, a display window appears in the hologram. Hinse and Yamasaki Hazuki appear in it without any change in their appearance. Hinse smiles at Ryo as he greets him politely while Yamasaki Hazuki sits next to him with a neutral expression and simply nods back at him in response to his greeting.
Heinz said, "I have just come out of my slumber. I am sorry to inform you that the planet on which you cursed the star is still orbiting it in exactly fifty years."
“Yeah, it was a joke after all. ” Luo Ge waved his hand with a self-mocking smile.
But compared to Taylor and Radiaz, you are still lucky.
“It seems that you are the only successful wall-facer out there, perhaps your strategy plan has truly enhanced human intelligence.”

Heinz also showed the same self-mocking smile that Rougemarion had just shown. He shook his head and said, "No, there's nothing at all. In fact, after we went into hibernation, they soon ran into an unsurmountable obstacle in research of human mind because if they went any deeper, they would have reached the quantum level of the brain thought mechanism, and then, just like with other branches of science, they came up against a wall that could not be surmounted. We haven't improved humans' intelligence at all; if anything, we had enhanced some people's confidence."
As Logicomix begins its winter sleep, Rousseau does not fully comprehend Hinse's last remark. However, he notices a mysterious smile on Shansheng's unemotional face.

The window disappeared, and when Lorelei looked around the room, she saw that all the attendees were wearing military uniforms. While their clothes didn't differ greatly in terms of mode, none of them had any images decorating them; however, their epaulettes and badges did glow with a gentle light. The chairman of the naval federation was still presiding over the meeting, and he was an official officer rather than a military officer. Looking at him, Lorelei thought of Galenus and realized that he too was an ancient person who had been lost in history along with countless others from his time period. In any case, she felt lucky to have survived two centuries later than him.

As the chairman, I hereby announce that we are now in the final vote on Proposal 649, which was jointly presented by North American and European Fleets at the previous conferences. First, I read the contents of the proposal aloud.

After the crisis of Three Body Problem appeared in the second year, the United Nations Planetary Defense Council developed the Plan to Face Wall and achieved a unanimous approval from all the Permanent Member countries. The core content of the plan is for four face wallers to be selected by the Permanent Member countries and proposed, who conduct completely closed personal thought and develop and execute strategies against the invasion of alien worlds to avoid being constantly monitored by the Chintian, thus achieving the strategic concealment. The United Nations also introduced corresponding Face Walling Act to ensure the autonomy of face wallers in developing and executing strategies.

The face-wall project has been in operation for two hundred and five years, during which the leadership of the plan was transferred from the Provisional Planetary Defense Council to the current Solar System Fleet Conference.

The face-wall project was born in a particular historical background. At that time, the Three Body crisis had just emerge and the international community was faced with the unprecedented crisis of destruction, and so the face-wall project was born in such a situation, which is not an intelligent choice but rather desperate struggles.

“History has proven that the wall plan is a complete and utter failure. It was without question the most ignorant, stupid decision humanity as an entity ever made throughout history. The faceless one was given unprecedented freedom to be dishonest to the international community, which goes against the basic ethics and laws of society.”

In the execution of the face-wall project, a large number of strategic resources were wasted in meaningless ways. The quantum fleet plan proposed by Frederick Taylor, who was responsible for the face wall, had proven to have no strategic significance, and Radiatz's Mercury descent chain reaction plan, even with current human capabilities, would also be impossible to implement. At the same time, both plans were crimes, as Taylor attempted to attack and destroy the Earth fleet, while Radiatz's intentions were even more depraved, attempting to hold the entire Earth life world hostage.

The other two face-wallers are also disappointing. While the Thought Improvement Program of Face-waller Heins is still unknown, the early fruits of his efforts—Thought Impressions—are criminal in the Space Force because they severely intrude on thought freedom which is the foundation for human civilization and progress.
As for the wall-facer Luo Ze, he first irresponsibly used public resources to create a luxurious life for himself and then created an absurd mystery act in order to get attention.

We believe that, with the decisive strengthening of humanity and grasping of war-making ability, the MDF has become irrelevant. Now is the appropriate time to end this historical legacy. We recommend that Fleet Conclave immediately cancel the MDF and abolish the UNMFAA.
I submit this proposal.
The chairman put down the proposed text slowly and looked around the conference hall. "Now is the time to vote on Proposal 649 of the Solar System Fleet."
All the representatives raised their hands.

The voting process in this era still remains so primitive, with staff roaming the halls to verify ballots. When they submit the summary results to the chairman, the chairman declares, "Prop 649 has passed unanimously and will come into effect from now on." The chairman raises his head as he does not know whether he is looking at himself or Hines, in the same way that Roogoo did not know where their images were displayed in the meeting room during the remote hearing session some two hundred and fifty years earlier. "Now, the Wallplanet program has been cancelled and the United Nations Wallplanet Act has also been rescinded," he announces. "I am hereby informing both Mr. Hines and Mr. Roogoo that their Wallplanet identities have been canceled, along with any legal immunities provided by the United Nations Wallplanet Act, as you will now return to your citizenships in your respective countries."
The chairman announced the end of the meeting and Jonathan stood up to turn off the holographic image as well as Rojo's nightmare that had lasted for centuries.
"Dr. Rousseau, as far as I know, this is exactly what you were looking for," Jonathan smiles at Roger.
"Yes, exactly what I wanted. Thank you, Commander. And thank you to the Federation Council for restoring my civilian identity." Riker said with sincerity in his voice.
The meeting was very short, just for voting on the proposals. I have been authorized to discuss more specific matters with you. You can start by talking about what is most important to you.
“My wife and children?” rogue asked impatiently, a question that had been running through his mind since he first saw Jonathan in the meeting.
Please don't worry, they are all in hibernation and I will give you their information. You can apply for them to wake up at any time.
“Thank you, thank you.” Luo Ze's eyes welled up again. He felt like he had been transported to heaven.

But, Dr. Ho, I have a personal suggestion, Jonathan close to the sofa said. "As a sleeper, it is not easy to adapt to this era, I suggest you let them live as stable as possible after waking up them, and the UN can also maintain their two hundred and thirty years of winter sleep."
"Well, how do I live outside?"

The special agent smiled and said, “Don't worry about that. Maybe it doesn't match with the times, but life is not a problem in this era. In this era, society offers adequate benefits and anyone who doesn't work can still live comfortably.” “Yes, that university is still in existence,” she added, “and they promised to consider your employment problems later, so please wait for their message.”
When Luo Ze suddenly thought of something, it was almost like a cold shiver going down his spine. “What about my safety after I leave?” The ETO wants to kill me!

"ETO?" Jonathan laughed, "The Earth Three Organization was completely eliminated a century ago. The modern world has no social foundation for them to exist in, of course there are people who still hold those ideals, but it is impossible for them to form any kind of organization nowadays. You're absolutely safe in the external world."

Just before leaving, Jonathan put aside his official demeanor and the star-patterned suit he wore began to shimmer brightly. He smiled at Lorence and said with a laugh, “Doctor, in all the historical figures I have met, you are the one who is most humorous. Spells for the stars, haha…”

Rou Quan stood alone in the reception room, chewing on the reality before his eyes and tasting a bit of the real world after two centuries as savior. He finally became an ordinary human being after returning to Earth, and a new life opened up in front of him.
“You have become a normal human being, my brother!” the voice was rough and loud. Luo Ge looked back and saw that Shi Qian had entered with him. “Hehe, I heard what the guy just said.”

In the joy of reunion, they exchanged their experiences. Luo Ge learned that Shi Qian had regained consciousness two months ago and his leukemia had been cured, and doctors also found out he had a high chance of developing liver disease, probably because of drinking. In fact, in their sense, the time spent apart wasn't too long; it was only about five years. But in the new age two centuries after waking up, there is still a sense of familiarity.
“I'll pick you up, there's nothing for me to do here.” Shiqiang said and took out an outfit from his backpack. He had Liu Ruixue put on it.
"This... too big?" said Luo Ge as he shook off the jacket with a tailored cut.
